Articles.Content:
I'm sorry if this is in the wrong forum or thread or whatever but this is what looked right.

I have been looking everywhere for toroidal parts mods but the only ones I can find aren't stocklike. I need either a mod for toroidal parts for my space stations or a way to make them without mods. Please help!

Are you trying to make a ring shape space station? Or do you want ring shaped parts?

Edit: Here is a tutorial on making circular stations with stock parts: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/62130-Tutorial-Circular-station-building

Cheers,

~Claw

Edited November 9, 2014 by Claw

I'm looking for both. Thank you so much for the tutorials though, they'll help me a lot. I also wanted a mod for toroidal parts for more variety but I can't find any that are compatible with 0.25. But thank you again. I can finally get back to building my station!

I believe this may be what you're looking for: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/30673-0-23-5-Spherical-and-Toroidal-Tank-Pack-%28Updated-05-02-14%29-%28New-download-link%29

EDIT: Never mind, it apparently has issues with 0.25. Sorry.

Porkjet's Habitat Pack has a stockalike habitat centrifuge (as well as some inflatable habs). Be sure to read the last few pages of the thread for instructions for getting it to work in 0.25, it hasn't been updated in a while.
